snippet: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago proposed statewide legislation on Thursday to require handgun owners to register their weapons.
abstract: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago proposes statewide legislation to require handgun owners to register their weapons; city requires handguns to be registered, but Illinois does not; a statewide registry would help the police follow the chain of possession for guns found at crime scenes that originate in other parts of Illinois.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago proposed statewide legislation on Thursday to require handgun owners to register their weapons.

headline.seo: Illinois: Chicago Mayor Seeks Statewide Gun Registry
headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Mayor Seeks Statewide Gun Registry
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Mayor Seeks Statewide Gun Registry
